hints.content:
This rectangle is split into $5$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{fifths}$, with $4$ pieces shaded.  

![A rectangle has 4 vertical lines dividing it into 5 equal parts. Four parts are shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/77407dbfbb1262705caa5bc449c971f0fd6a11f7)

The rectangle has **four fifths** of the shape shaded.

This rectangle is not split into equal-sized pieces.

![A rectangle has 1 vertical line and 1 horizontal line dividing it into 4 unequal parts. The two smaller parts are shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/23a2f4f38dee08482ba2f4b9ac6a5b4a18a01a4e)

This rectangle is split into $4$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{fourths}$, with $2$ pieces shaded.  

![A rectangle has 1 vertical line and 1 horizontal line dividing it into 4 equal parts. Two parts are shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/78beea7084ddfdfb7bdf462da32652857641b729)

The rectangle has **two fourths** of the shape shaded.

This rectangle is split into $4$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{fourths}$, with $4$ piece shaded.  

![A rectangle has 3 vertical lines dividing it into 4 equal parts. Four parts are shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/65a3627f4396f6e09efbb0d814c3efa571c0ce83)

This rectangle has **four fourths** of the shape shaded.

This rectangle has **four fourths** of the shape shaded:

![A rectangle has 3 vertical lines dividing it into 4 equal parts. Four parts are shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/65a3627f4396f6e09efbb0d814c3efa571c0ce83)

question.content:
**Which rectangle shows four fourths of the shape shaded?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 4]]

choices.content: ![A rectangle has 1 vertical line and 1 horizontal line dividing it into 4 equal parts. Two parts are shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/78beea7084ddfdfb7bdf462da32652857641b729)

![A rectangle has 1 vertical line and 1 horizontal line dividing it into 4 unequal parts. The two smaller parts are shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/23a2f4f38dee08482ba2f4b9ac6a5b4a18a01a4e)
![A rectangle has 3 vertical lines dividing it into 4 equal parts. Four parts are shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/65a3627f4396f6e09efbb0d814c3efa571c0ce83)
![A rectangle has 4 vertical lines dividing it into 5 equal parts. Four parts are shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/77407dbfbb1262705caa5bc449c971f0fd6a11f7)
